attributes.action: Supermarkets staff to wear gloves and possibly masks
attributes.additional_details: To help stop the spread of this virus so we can control the virus through what methods we can control and not to take unnecessary chances.
attributes.background: To put in temporary rules or guidelines for supermarkets to make all staff ie.stock replenishing delivery drivers and till operators to wear gloves and possible masks to reduce the virus being spread to all household goods.
